# autoresizingMask

**Type Property**

Allows the table column to resize automatically in response to resizing the table view. The resizing behavior for the table view is set using the `NSTableView` method [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTableView/columnAutoresizingStyle-swift.property].

## Declaration

```swift
static var autoresizingMask: NSTableColumn.ResizingOptions { get }
```

## Constants

- **userResizingMask**: Allows the table column to be resized by the user.

items.description: Allows the table column to be resized by the user.
